posts.title: Dinamicheskaya tipizatsiya luchshe staticheskoy!
posts.content: Chto ty tam lyapnul, kloun? Idi syuda! Ty kuda pobezhal?

posts.author: Muzhik
posts.title: Ty khot' raz litso snegom umyval?

posts.author: Tot, kto manevriruyet
posts.title: Raz, fukh fukh fukh fukh. Zakonchili manovr, ostavlis' na meste.
posts.content: Nazhali na tormoz, i prosto yedite dal'she

posts.author: Steve Anderson
posts.title: How to get the job in IT sphere?
posts.content: It's easy. Work hard or die trying :)
